title: Writing Markup with JSX
description: Welcome to the React documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to writing markup with JSX.

meta.title: Writing Markup with JSX: An Introduction to React Documentation
meta.description: Learn how to write markup with JSX, a powerful syntax for creating React components and displaying dynamic data.
meta.keywords: jsx, react, web development, programming, markup
